hook.title: Get your Extended Free Trial
hook.offer: Register in advance and use MatchApp free of charge for 4 months instead of 1!

form.accept-terms: I accept the data protection conditions for participating in the MatchApp pre-registration

register.link-sent: To verify your registration, please click on the link that you have received by email

error.not-human: Please confirm that you are not a robot
error.terms-not-accepted: Please accept the data protection conditions
error.passwords-not-match: Passwords do not match. Please try again
error.weak-password: Please choose a password with at least 6 characters

reset.reset-password: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
reset.sent: Email sent! Please check your inbox

error.user-not-found: Unable to login. Please double check your username and password
